entities.description: Whether the respondent paid for the last alcoholic beverage they drank.
Whether the respondent bought the last alcoholic beverage themselves or gave money for someone else to buy it.
The location where the respondent bought the last alcoholic beverage they drank.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent paid for the last alcoholic beverage they drank.
Indicates the mode of purchase for the last alcoholic beverage, whether bought by the respondent or by someone else on their behalf.
Specifies the location where the respondent bought the last alcoholic beverage.
